attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the showing of a play commissioned by the NATIONAL UNION OF MINEWORKERS that celebrates the death of Margaret Thatcher. It is a crime to incite hatred and these people are vitriolic, they can't share enough of their hatred of Mrs.Thatcher.  There are laws that stop racial hatred, hatred based on sexual orientation etc etc and this old lady in the twilight of her years is helpless against these bitter people.  The play should be stopped it is pure malice.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
